query:
ALTER TABLE agents 
ADD COLUMN mode ENUM('sandbox', 'governed') DEFAULT 'sandbox' AFTER policyContext,
ADD COLUMN governanceStatus ENUM('SANDBOX', 'GOVERNED_VALID', 'GOVERNED_RESTRICTED', 'GOVERNED_INVALIDATED') DEFAULT 'SANDBOX' AFTER mode,
ADD COLUMN governance JSON AFTER governanceStatus,
ADD COLUMN version INT DEFAULT 1 AFTER governance,
ADD COLUMN roleClass VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'assistant' AFTER version,
ADD COLUMN sandboxConstraints JSON AFTER roleClass,
ADD COLUMN expiresAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER sandboxConstraints,
ADD COLUMN proofId VARCHAR(255) AFTER expiresAt;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2mRYiUGqDHCaXxC.root --database Y5Wav99nvtrRC8pT5fEnKy --execute ALTER TABLE agents 
ADD COLUMN mode ENUM('sandbox', 'governed') DEFAULT 'sandbox' AFTER policyContext,
ADD COLUMN governanceStatus ENUM('SANDBOX', 'GOVERNED_VALID', 'GOVERNED_RESTRICTED', 'GOVERNED_INVALIDATED') DEFAULT 'SANDBOX' AFTER mode,
ADD COLUMN governance JSON AFTER governanceStatus,
ADD COLUMN version INT DEFAULT 1 AFTER governance,
ADD COLUMN roleClass VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'assistant' AFTER version,
ADD COLUMN sandboxConstraints JSON AFTER roleClass,
ADD COLUMN expiresAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER sandboxConstraints,
ADD COLUMN proofId VARCHAR(255) AFTER expiresAt;
